targets.query: SELECT sum(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT last("value")  AS A FROM "SqlListenerSqlProcTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(null)) GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("value") FROM "SqlListenerSqlProcTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT sum(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT last("value")  AS A FROM "SqlListenerIdleTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(null)) GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("value") FROM "SqlListenerIdleTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT sum(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT last("raw")  AS A FROM "ClientCncts" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(null)) GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("raw") FROM "ClientCncts" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT sum(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT last("value")  AS A FROM "SqlListenerStallTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(null)) GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("value") FROM "SqlListenerStallTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT sum(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT last("value")  AS A FROM "SqlListenerThrottleTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(null)) GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("value") FROM "SqlListenerThrottleTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("raw") AS A FROM "ClientCncts" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "$group" fill(0)

SELECT sum(A) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS A FROM "SqlListenerThrottleTime" WHERE (nodetype = 'Transaction') AND db =~ /^$database$/ AND host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host","pid") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum(A) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS A FROM "SqlListenerSqlProcTime" WHERE (nodetype = 'Transaction') AND db =~ /^$database$/ AND host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host","pid") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum(A) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS A FROM "SqlListenerIdleTime" WHERE (nodetype = 'Transaction') AND db =~ /^$database$/ AND host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host","pid") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum(A) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS A FROM "SqlListenerStallTime" WHERE (nodetype = 'Transaction') AND db =~ /^$database$/ AND host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host","pid") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum(A) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS A FROM "SqlListenerThrottleTime" WHERE (nodetype = 'Transaction') AND db =~ /^$database$/ AND host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host","pid") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT SUM("value") FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS value FROM "SqlListenerSqlProcTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "$group" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "SqlListenerIdleTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "$group" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "SqlListenerIdleTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "$group" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Milliseconds" WITH KEY = "db"
list.label: Database
list.name: database
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Milliseconds" WITH KEY = "db"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host"  WHERE db =~ /^$database$/  AND nodetype = 'Transaction'
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host"  WHERE db =~ /^$database$/  AND nodetype = 'Transaction'
